response.raw:
Here is a possible client-ready memo for referring unresolved customer grievances:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
MEMO

To: [Relevant Department Heads]
From: [Your Name], Senior Customer Service Representative
Subject: Unresolved Customer Grievances for Further Investigation

Please be advised that the following customer grievances remain unresolved after initial customer service efforts. These cases require further investigation and follow-up from the designated departments:

1. Customer #12345 - Billing discrepancy
   Refer to: Accounting Department

2. Customer #67890 - Product quality issue
   Refer to: Quality Assurance Department

3. Customer #24680 - Delayed shipping
   Refer to: Logistics Department

4. Customer #13579 - Website technical difficulties
   Refer to: IT Department

Kindly review these cases and take appropriate action to resolve the customers' concerns. Please provide status updates on your findings and resolutions within 5 business days.

Thank you for your prompt attention to these matters.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
